name: New Event
_source: speak;Reimu;Oh, Marisa. What are you doing here?
speak;Marisa;Well, I just went by Kourindou and picked up this cool new magic item on sale.
speak;Marisa;Hey, it's rude to make assumptions.
speak;Reimu;So, I'm guessing the shrine is a good place to show it off?
speak;Marisa;Well, where else am I supposed to go?
speak;Marisa;And have you miss out on this?|You know me better than that!
speak;Reimu;Fine, fine. What is this thing anyway?
speak;Marisa;I'm glad you asked. Check this out!
speak;Reimu;...That looks like one of those gadgets the kappa have.
speak;Marisa;Now I still haven't worked out the details, so I don't know how this thing works.
speak;Reimu;Hmm, what if I press this button.
speak;Marisa;W-wait a minute! This thing might be dangerous!|Mind yer distance, will ya'?
speak;Reimu;Wait, I think it's trying to show us something.
speak;Marisa;Well, we might as well watch then.
